means.word_mean: 1. a liquor or brew containing alcohol as the active agent;
2. a drug that can produce a state of intoxication

auth_sentence.content: No matter what, pot is an incredibly mild form of intoxicant.
auth_sentence.res_content: No matter what, pot is an incredibly mild form of intoxicant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No matter what, pot is an incredibly mild form of intoxicant.

auth_sentence.content: To millions, marijuana will remain an aid in illness, and in health, a moderate intoxicant with fewer side effects than alcohol.
